Html:
Hi, I would like to ask if Rawr 4.3.0 (my the best friend to help me to have the best gear) calculate with nerf of this staff.

Wrath of Tarecgosa
When you deal damage, you have a chance to gain the Wrath of Tarecgosa, duplicating the harmful spell.


Someone talking about nerf proc from 15% to 5%.

Thx
It depends on the model. I can tell you for mage that it does not, it's still using 10%.
